text: Tse yavlyaye soboyu harnu novynu z BOHA do Yoho sluzhbovtsiv shcho vvazhayutʹ ta vedutʹ spravedlyve zhyttya. Skazhitʹ, "ya ne proshu vas dlya budʹ-yakoyi zarplaty. YA zapytuvaty kozhnyy z vas popikluvatysya pro vashykh vlasnykh rodychiv." Budʹ khto khto spravedlyva robota, my mnozhymo yoho vynahorodu dlya tse. BOH Forgiver, Appreciative
